name: Crockpot Beef Soup
instructions: Combine beef and flour in large Ziploc bag; shake well to coat. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook beef until browned on all sides, then place in crockpot. Use drippings to cook onion, celery and garlic; add to crockpot. Add remaining ingredients. Cover and cook on Low 8 hours or until beef is tender.
